welcome_message_body: Welcome to vibrant and diverse Kowloon City! Known for its bustling markets, delicious street food, and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this dynamic city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Door Door Bakery (多多麵飽西餅)
restaurants.description: Door Door Bakery (多多麵飽西餅) is a bakery located in 荔枝角.

restaurants.name: Brut!
restaurants.description: Brut! is a tapas restaurant located in 香港.

restaurants.name: Tsong Long Ting (滄浪亭)
restaurants.description: Tsong Long Ting (滄浪亭) is a noodle restaurant located in 香港.
restaurants.address: 25-26 Platform, 7-11 Broadway Street, Mei Foo Sun Chuen Stage 1, Mei Foo, Kowloon

restaurants.name: 永合成馳名煲仔飯
restaurants.description: 永合成馳名煲仔飯 is a hong kong restaurant located in the city.
restaurants.address: G/F, 360 Des Voeux Road West, Western District

restaurants.name: BBQ
restaurants.description: BBQ is a hong kong restaurant located in Sai Ying Pun.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hong Kong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 3 hours at the airport.
